name: imageDrawLine
description: Draws a single line defined by two sets of x and y coordinates on a ColdFusion image.

params.name: name
params.description: The image on which this operation is performed.

params.name: x1
params.description: The x coordinate for the start point of the line.

params.name: y1
params.description: The y coordinate for the start point of the line.

params.name: x2
params.description: The x coordinate for the end point of the line.

params.name: y2
params.description: The y coordinate for the end point of the line.

examples.title: Tag Syntax
examples.description: This example shows how to draw a square bisected by a diagonal line.
examples.code:
<!--- Use the imageNew function to create a 100x100-pixel image. ---> 
 <cfset myImage=imageNew("",100,100)> 
 <!--- Turn on antialiasing to improve image quality. ---> 
 <cfset imageSetAntialiasing(myImage,"on")> 
 <!--- Draw a diagonal line that bisects the square. ---> 
 <cfset imageDrawLine(myImage,0,0,100,100)> 
 <!--- Display the image in a browser. ---> 
 <cfimage source="#myImage#" action="writeToBrowser">
